### ğŸš¦ Hybrid AI Pipeline for High-Performance Real-Time Urban Traffic Forecasting

- ğŸ¯ Utilizes **parallel processing** for optimized real-time execution.  

---

### ğŸ¦‹ MBO-DeBERTa: Optimized DeBERTa Transformer Model for AI-Powered E-Commerce Fake Review Detection  
### [ğŸ”— View Project](https://github.com/Manas120104/MBO-DEBERTA)  
**Business AI Solution**  
- ğŸ”¬ Implements an optimized **DeBERTa** transformer architecture for detecting fake reviews in e-commerce platforms.  
- ğŸ¦‹ Employs a **metaheuristic optimization** approach for robust hyperparameter tuning and improved model accuracy.

### ğŸ§  AI-Powered E-Commerce Product Recommender

- ğŸ›’ Builds an **AI-powered recommender engine** that provides real-time product suggestions based on user interactions and preferences.  
- âš™ï¸ Integrates **content-based** and **collaborative filtering** with **GenAI-driven explanation generation** for transparent recommendations.

---

### ğŸŒ± Predicting Medicinal Properties of Plant Extracts with Advanced Neural Network Architectures  
### [ğŸ”— View Project](https://github.com/Manas120104/Plant-Extract)  
**Predictive Healthcare AI Solution**  
- ğŸ§  Employs advanced neural network (NN) architectures to predict medicinal properties of **copper nanoparticles synthesized from plant extracts**.  
- ğŸ¤– Includes **Gradient Boosted NN**, **Bagged NN**, **LSTM**, **GRU**, **RNN**, **Feedforward NN**, and **TabNet** (both multitask and single-task).  

---
